page.title: 05When we surveyed Peacehaven
page.content: Our group was taken to Peacehaven in the school mini-bus so we could interview people for our Domesday Project. We were given some duplicated questions so we would know what to ask. We did not find many people as most of them were at work. Some of us hid and let our partners go up and ask the questions because we were shy. Not every one answered our questions (some gave excuses why they couldn't answer, some were quite rude to us and two of us were chased by a dog). One man, working in his garden, said he thought the Domesday book was King Canute's idea! But most people were helpful and answered our questions. When we finished interviewing we went back to school and were late for dinner.
